## SingleConnectionPool.(constructor)

Creates a new SingleConnectionPool<T> Not really a pool. Always uses just one pool-object. The pool-object is created on the first get()

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(settings: PoolSettings<T>);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  settings | [PoolSettings](./ystd.poolsettings.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; |  |
